data.title: Hotel Schweizerhof Luzern: Where the European Championship is being played in Lucerne
data.meta_description: This year, the Hotel Schweizerhof Luzern is hosting a public viewing of a different kind.
data.text:
The Festival Hotel will finally be the meeting place for all football fans again. Behind the festival hotel, guests can enjoy public viewing on a big screen. All matches will be broadcast on the screen. The most important matches of the preliminary round and, from the round of 16 onwards, all matches will be shown with sound and catering. The VIP offer will provide culinary accompaniment to the matches.

The matches of the 2024 European Football Championship will be shown on a 36m2 LED screen. In case of bad weather, the public viewing will take place in the premises of the Hotel Schweizerhof Luzern.

Let's share the excitement together!

We offer an interesting VIP package for all football fans who want to enjoy the games comfortably seated, with culinary accompaniment and in a group. Seating is guaranteed and the game becomes a team event.

Great competition - take part now!

The following public viewing partners are offering attractive prizes:

Hotel Schweizerhof LuzernOne overnight stay for 2 people in a deluxe double room with lake view, including breakfastSwisscomOne Samsung S921 Galaxy S24 Gray 256GBCSSGolden round trip for 2 people (excursion by boat, cogwheel railway and aerial cableway to the most beautiful spots around the Pilatus and to the summit)EichhofBrewery tour including catering and beer tasting, for 10 peopleOttoâs

3 vouchers of CHF 300.00, 200.00 and 100.00 each

valiant

2 VIP tickets for the European Championship final match on Sunday, 14 July 2024, at Schweizerhof Public Viewing
